name: Memberstack
headline: Add user accounts and payments to any website with one line of code
description:
Memberstack makes it easy to add user accounts and recurring payments to static websites, Webflow, Squarespace, and more! 

We‚Äôve helped 1000+ companies generate millions in recurring revenue, and we‚Äôre just getting started üòÅ If we succeed, Memberstack will enable hundreds of thousands of people to create powerful web apps and massive online businesses.

Memberstack is backed by some incredible leaders, advisors, and investors who helped build the companies we use every day. Check the link for more info üëá

https://www.memberstack.com/blog/1000-customers-and-fundraise

How Memberstack Works
## Build anything in Webflow, and use Memberstack to monetize it ü§ë
When it comes to design and branding, you're the boss - build anything you want in Webflow, and use custom attributes to make it work with Memberstack.
[Explore all features](https://www.memberstack.com/</features>)[Open demo](https://www.memberstack.com/<#>)

## Frequently Asked Questions
If there's anything you're still unsure about, take a read through the questions people usually ask us!
About Memberstack
Who is Memberstack for?
Companies building with [Stripe](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration>), [Webflow](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/with/react>), and/or [React](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/with/webflow>).‍Companies like American Airlines, Slack, Entreprenuer.com, and Smart Passive Income use Memberstack to serve millions of members every single day.‍And top Webflow agencies like [Relume](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/showcase/how-we-built-relume-library>), Finsweet, Flowbase, Refokus, Whiteboard, and Brandweld use Memberstack to build beautiful client projects with user [auth](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/features#authentication>), [gated content](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/features/gate-content>), and [Stripe payments](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration>). It‚Äôs free until you‚Äôre ready to go live.
What is Memberstack & what are the main features?
Launch a beautiful Webflow MVP in a weekend and give yourself the option to scale into a custom[ React application](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/with/react>) without needing to migrate anything on the backend.‍In [Webflow ‚Üí Memberstack](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/with/webflow>) uses data attributes to tap into your Webflow project. This means you can build everything from [profile screens](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/webflow-components/profile>) to [forgotten password flows](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/webflow-components/forgot-password>) all according to your own visual style.‍Pick from [600+ Customizable Webflow Components ‚Üí](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/freebies>)
Does Memberstack have an API?
Yes ‚Äî there are multiple ways to interact with Memberstack data. Here are some handy guides on how to do so: [Front-end API](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/docs/dom>), [Back-end API](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/docs/admin>), [Webhooks](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/7329156946587-Webhooks>), [Zapier Integration](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/7252886662299-Zapier-Integration>), and [Make.com Integration](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/7252991415323-Make-com-Integration>).
Can I talk to someone about my product or idea?
Yes, of course! Please post in our [Community](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/slack>) ‚Äî we'd love to hear what you're working on and how we can help.
Billing & Pricing
Does Memberstack have a free trial?
Yes, absolutely! All of Memberstack's features are **free to try (no credit card)** on a test site for an **unlimited amount of time**. This means that you can take the time you need to set up Memberstack fully in test mode, and only pay when your website is ready to accept real members.
How do the member limits work?
We count the total number of [Live](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/7595262385819-Managing-Test-Mode-and-Live-Mode>) members. This includes all free and paying members. And excludes any test mode members.You will receive an email when you are 90% of the way to your current member limit.‍When you reach 100% on the [Basic and Professional plans](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/memberstack.webflow.io/pricing>) we will automatically upgrade your account to the next tier. If you are on the Business or Established plans we will automatically increase your member limit by 20,000 to avoid interruptions.
What are transaction fees and when do they apply?
We define a **transaction** as whenever a member pays to sign up on your website through Memberstack. A **transaction fee** is a service fee based on a given percentage of each transaction.If you only have free members, then the transaction fees _do not_ apply to you. If you do require your members to pay during signup, then Memberstack charges a flat transaction fee based on your plan.Please note that Memberstack's transaction fees do not include the fees that Stripe charges.
How do I receive the money from the sales on my Website?
Memberstack uses [Stripe](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/stripe.com/>) to process payments securely on our users' websites and for payouts. Money you earn on your website is directly and securely transferred to your bank account via Stripe.
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for non-profits?
As a mission-driven organization, we're happy to support non-profits with a 50% discount for 12 months ‚Äî please fill out this form with details on your non-profit to activate it: [www.memberstack.com/nonprofit](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/nonprofit>).
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for students and young professionals?
We believe in empowering young professionals as they work their way through school or embark on their careers.**If you are between the ages of 18 and 22, you can receive a 100% discount on our services.** Please upload proof of age as part of your application.Apply now through our [Young Professionals Discount Application Form](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/student>).
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for startups?
As a startup, we know how hard it can be to make purchasing decisions - especially when the cost is a % of your revenue. This is why **we offer a special discount for those that have attended a startup program like Y Combinator, 500 Startups, or Launch and raised less than $1 million in funding.** Apply now through our [Startup Discount Application Form](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/startups>).
Does Memberstack have a refund policy?
**Yes‚Ä¶** If you have paid for a yearly or a monthly plan in the last 30-days you are entitled to a prorated refund. If you‚Äôre not happy with Memberstack, let us know and we will make things right! If you‚Äôre still not happy.**PS‚Ä¶** You must request a refund with-in 45-days of upgrading to be eligible.**PPS‚Ä¶** Please contact us if you have any concerns. We‚Äôll do everything in our power to make things right!
Data & Security
Does Memberstack have a privacy policy & security policy?
Yes. Our [Terms of Service](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11420153399067-Terms-of-Service>), [Privacy Policy](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11419812024347-Privacy-Policy>), [Security Policy](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11420444005531-Security-Policy>), [Data Processing Addendum](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11419466621083-Data-Processing-Addendum-DPA->), [Cookie Policy](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11420007709467-Cookie-Policy>) and [List of Sub-processors](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/11419393078427>) are accessible at the bottom of any page on our website.
Are my members' emails and passwords secured by Memberstack?
Yes. Data stored in Memberstack about your members is secured using industry best practices ‚Äî this includes member emails, passwords and metadata. We force [HTTPS](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.cloudflare.com/learning/ssl/what-is-https/>) so that data between your website and our servers is **always encrypted**. Data stored in our database is also encrypted at rest. We also take regular automated backups in order to stay safe.We are an official Stripe Partner to process payments ‚Äî so **we do not have access to and do not store any financial information**.
Does Memberstack access or store any of my members' financial information?
Memberstack uses [Stripe](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/www.memberstack.com/features/stripe-integration>) to process payments ‚Äî we are an Official Stripe Partner. **We do not have access to and do not store any financial information about our customer's members.**
Can I use Memberstack to gate highly sensitive information?
Most Memberstack features gate content on the front-end - meaning, a determined person with the right knowledge will be able to get around our content gating. This applies to pages/elements that you build in Webflow, and then gate using Memberstack.However, **there are various ways to keep information secure, like:‍****1. Hosted Content:** Using our hosted content feature, you can keep text-based content (including links & HTML) stored inside of Memberstack, and it is not served to the user unless they have been authenticated.**2. Member JSON & Metadata:** This member-specific information is added by the member and lives inside Memberstack. The only person who should be able to access it is the owner of the account, and the account admin.Security is a tricky and nuanced topic - if you're unsure if Memberstack's security is a good fit for your use case, [please send a message in our Slack channel](https://www.memberstack.com/</slack>) to get advice and recommendations from the community, our team, and our experts.
Is Memberstack GDPR compliant?
**Yes** ‚Äî We are committed to helping our customers and users understand and, where applicable, comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).In addition to strengthening and standardizing user data privacy across jurisdictions, GDPR introduce additional obligations on all organizations that handle personal data.[On this page, we explain how Memberstack complies with GDPR.](https://www.memberstack.com/<https:/docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/16351989319067-GDPR-Compliance-Overview?_gl=1*1jmgyor*_ga*MTI1MTg0Mjk0LjE3MjU5MDI3MzI.*_ga_M18GBY4NJ0*MTczMDM3ODczMC4xNC4xLjE3MzAzODMxNTMuNjAuMC4w>)
Can I upload and store content in Memberstack for my members to access?
**Yes** ‚Äî This article will show you how to securely serve HTML or securely populate links only when a member is allowed access. <https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/15074205669403-Hosted-Content>

Billing & Pricing
Does Memberstack have a free trial?
Yes, absolutely! All of Memberstack's features are **free to try (no credit card)** on a test site for an **unlimited amount of time**. This means that you can take the time you need to set up Memberstack fully in test mode, and only pay when your website is ready to accept real members.
How do the member limits work?
We count the total number of Live‚ü®99‚ü© members. This includes all free and paying members. And excludes any test mode members.You will receive an email when you are 90% of the way to your current member limit.‍When you reach 100% on the Basic and Professional plans‚ü®100‚ü© we will automatically upgrade your account to the next tier. If you are on the Business or Established plans we will automatically increase your member limit by 20,000 to avoid interruptions.
What are transaction fees and when do they apply?
We define a **transaction** as whenever a member pays to sign up on your website through Memberstack. A **transaction fee** is a service fee based on a given percentage of each transaction.If you only have free members, then the transaction fees _do not_ apply to you. If you do require your members to pay during signup, then Memberstack charges a flat transaction fee based on your plan.Please note that Memberstack's transaction fees do not include the fees that Stripe charges.
How do I receive the money from the sales on my Website?
Memberstack uses Stripe‚ü®101‚ü© to process payments securely on our users' websites and for payouts. Money you earn on your website is directly and securely transferred to your bank account via Stripe.
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for non-profits?
As a mission-driven organization, we're happy to support non-profits with a 50% discount for 12 months ‚Äî please fill out this form with details on your non-profit to activate it: www.memberstack.com/nonprofit‚ü®102‚ü©.
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for students and young professionals?
We believe in empowering young professionals as they work their way through school or embark on their careers.**If you are between the ages of 18 and 22, you can receive a 100% discount on our services.** Please upload proof of age as part of your application.Apply now through our Young Professionals Discount Application Form‚ü®103‚ü©.
Does Memberstack offer any discounts for startups?
As a startup, we know how hard it can be to make purchasing decisions - especially when the cost is a % of your revenue. This is why **we offer a special discount for those that have attended a startup program like Y Combinator, 500 Startups, or Launch and raised less than $1 million in funding.** Apply now through our Startup Discount Application Form‚ü®104‚ü©.
Does Memberstack have a refund policy?
**Yes‚Ä¶** If you have paid for a yearly or a monthly plan in the last 30-days you are entitled to a prorated refund. If you‚Äôre not happy with Memberstack, let us know and we will make things right! If you‚Äôre still not happy.**PS‚Ä¶** You must request a refund with-in 45-days of upgrading to be eligible.**PPS‚Ä¶** Please contact us if you have any concerns. We‚Äôll do everything in our power to make things right!
Data & Security
Does Memberstack have a privacy policy & security policy?
Yes. Our Terms of Service‚ü®105‚ü©, Privacy Policy‚ü®106‚ü©, Security Policy‚ü®107‚ü©, Data Processing Addendum‚ü®108‚ü©, Cookie Policy‚ü®109‚ü© and List of Sub-processors‚ü®110‚ü© are accessible at the bottom of any page on our website.
Are my members' emails and passwords secured by Memberstack?
Yes. Data stored in Memberstack about your members is secured using industry best practices ‚Äî this includes member emails, passwords and metadata. We force HTTPS‚ü®111‚ü© so that data between your website and our servers is **always encrypted**. Data stored in our database is also encrypted at rest. We also take regular automated backups in order to stay safe.We are an official Stripe Partner to process payments ‚Äî so **we do not have access to and do not store any financial information**.
Does Memberstack access or store any of my members' financial information?
Memberstack uses Stripe‚ü®85‚ü© to process payments ‚Äî we are an Official Stripe Partner. **We do not have access to and do not store any financial information about our customer's members.**
Can I use Memberstack to gate highly sensitive information?
Most Memberstack features gate content on the front-end - meaning, a determined person with the right knowledge will be able to get around our content gating. This applies to pages/elements that you build in Webflow, and then gate using Memberstack.However, **there are various ways to keep information secure, like:‍****1. Hosted Content:** Using our hosted content feature, you can keep text-based content (including links & HTML) stored inside of Memberstack, and it is not served to the user unless they have been authenticated.**2. Member JSON & Metadata:** This member-specific information is added by the member and lives inside Memberstack. The only person who should be able to access it is the owner of the account, and the account admin.Security is a tricky and nuanced topic - if you're unsure if Memberstack's security is a good fit for your use case, please send a message in our Slack channel‚ü®19‚ü© to get advice and recommendations from the community, our team, and our experts.
Is Memberstack GDPR compliant?
**Yes** ‚Äî We are committed to helping our customers and users understand and, where applicable, comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).In addition to strengthening and standardizing user data privacy across jurisdictions, GDPR introduce additional obligations on all organizations that handle personal data.On this page, we explain how Memberstack complies with GDPR.‚ü®112‚ü©
Can I upload and store content in Memberstack for my members to access?
**Yes** ‚Äî This article will show you how to securely serve HTML or securely populate links only when a member is allowed access. <https://docs.memberstack.com/hc/en-us/articles/15074205669403-Hosted-Content>

generated_description:
**Memberstack: A Seamless Solution for Web Monetization**

Founded in 2019 and a product of Y Combinator's S20 batch, Memberstack has quickly made a name for itself in the no-code tools arena. Its core mission is straightforward: add user accounts and recurring payment systems to any website with just a single line of code. This powerful simplicity has allowed over 1,000 companies to generate millions in recurring revenue‚Äîa sign of the massive potential they aim to unlock by helping users create robust web applications and businesses.
